newsitem.title: USA: ECRI future U.S. inflation gauge 104.8 Aug 9 week.
newsitem.headline: ECRI future U.S. inflation gauge 104.8 Aug 9 week.

text.p: The Economic Cycle Research Institute (ECRI) weekly Future Inflation Gauge (FIG) rose to 104.8 in the week ended August 9 from 104.5 the previous week, ECRI said.

Faster growth of real estate loans, a narrowing of the yield spread between the 10-year Treasury note and three-month Treasury bill and a drop in the growth rate of industrial materials prices contributed to the rise, ECRI said.
"Although there is a gradual lessening of disinflationary tendencies, underlying inflation pressures are likely to remain contained," ECRI said.
